snippet: The Arizona Republican has been hounded after a picture of him with members of the Free Syrian Army was misinterpreted and doctored purposely to make it appear that he supported ISIS, which he does not.
abstract: Senator John McCain is battling persistent, and false, Internet rumors that he not only helped invent Islamic State in Iraq and Syria but also knows its leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi after a picture of him with members of Free Syrian Army was misinterpreted and purposely doctored.
lead_paragraph: The Arizona Republican has been hounded after a picture of him with members of the Free Syrian Army was misinterpreted and doctored purposely to make it appear that he supported ISIS, which he does not.

headline.main: Try as He May, John McCain Can’t Shake Falsehoods About Ties to ISIS
headline.print_headline: McCain Fights Falsehoods Online That Wrongly Link Him to ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
